attributes.action: place a restriction on the price of bread.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The price of bread is extortionate with most brands/styles over the £1 mark and some up to £1.50. For an 'every day' cornerstone of the nation's diet for fibre, it is too high a cost to pay for a food which should be readily attainable for all, at no significant cost.

We propose that the government impose a price cap on bread. The upper limit should be no more than 40p.
